Literature.Title: Peptidomimetic antibiotics target outer-membrane biogenesis in Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Srinivas N, Jetter P, Ueberbacher BJ, Werneburg M, Zerbe K, Steinmann J, Van der Meijden B, Bernardini F, Lederer A, Dias RL, Misson PE, Henze H, Zumbrunn J, Gombert FO, Obrecht D, Hunziker P, Schauer S, Ziegler U, Käch A, Eberl L, Riedel K, DeMarco SJ, Robinson JA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.008µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=0.008µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii DSM 3008(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>64µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia ATCC 13637(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis DSM 12956(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µg/ml)
